title: EmployeeType
description: This entire schema has been deprecated. The data has been added to Common/Deployment.  The information about a person and their relationship as an employee.

SpecialClassificationTypeArray.description: A special classification of the Employee e.g. a VIP, Owner, Highly Compensated, Stock Owner, Executive, Officer, etc.

code.description: A code indicating the special classification.

indicator.description: An indicator of the special classification.

percentage.description: The percentage of a person's allocation that is considered the special classification.

positionTypeCode.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the PositionTypeCode in PositionType or Deployment/PositionType instead.

laborBargainingUnitMemberIndicator.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the LaborBargainingUnitIndicator in DeploymentType instead.

reportingCode.description: Deprecated. Do Not Use. Use the EmployeeReportingCode in DeploymentType instead.
